DOC.brief_summary: Monocentric observational study needle exsufflation pneumothorax ICU .
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective prospective observational non interventional study investigate possible relationship prior duration pneumothorax ( defined duration first occurence chest pain report patient exsufflation ) success exsufflation procedure ( define absence chest tube insertion follow 24h ) .
DOC.criteria: adult ICU patient require needle exsufflation spontaneous pneumothorax refuse participate contraindication needle exsufflation ( acute respiratory failure require immediate chest tube insertion )
